DOC.brief_title: Impact Performance Institutionalizing Immediate Post-partum IUD Services
DOC.detailed_description: The International Federation Gynaecology Obstetrics ( FIGO ) design plan implement , nationally-affiliated Associations Gynaecologists Obstetricians , intervention program post-partum IUD ( PPIUD ) service . As part Program , FIGO responsible information material , train provider , improve facility , quality service , monitor program . Independent implementation , study measure impact performance intervention three ( Sri Lanka , Nepal Tanzania ) six country participate FIGO project entitle : `` Institutionalization immediate post-partum IUD ( PPIUD ) service routine part antenatal counselling delivery room service Sri Lanka , Kenya , India , Tanzania , Nepal Bangladesh . '' The FIGO intervention take place nine-month period Tanzania ( nine month first group three hospital three month second group three hospital ) , fifteen-month period Nepal Sri Lanka ( fifteen month first group three hospital nine month second group three hospital ) . Investigators study impact intervention uptake subsequent continue use PPIUD extent intervention lead institutionalization postpartum IUD service hospital FIGO intervention extent service diffuse hospital provider . The institutionalization diffusion intervention measure interview follow trained provider , review hospital record baseline , intervention post-intervention facility survey .
